scripts.schema: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=testpass DB_PORT=3306 DB_ENDPOINT=localhost DB_READ_ENDPOINT=localhost ts-node -e 'import {getDbSchema} from "./src/utils/dbUtils/getDbSchema"; import {resetDb} from "./src/utils/testUtils"; resetDb().then(() => getDbSchema()).then(s => {console.log(s); process.exit(0)});'; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test: npm run test:startdb; TEST_ENV=true TEST_STRIPE_LOCAL=${TEST_STRIPE_LOCAL:=true} LOG_LEVEL=${LOG_LEVEL:=silent} DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=testpass DB_PORT=3306 DB_ENDPOINT=localhost DB_READ_ENDPOINT=localhost mocha --recursive --timeout 5000 --require ts-node/register --require ./src/utils/testUtils/setLogLevel.ts --require ./src/utils/testUtils/dotEnvSafe.ts --require stripe-stateful-mock/autostart --exit "src/**/*.test.ts"; npm run test:stopdb
scripts.test:startdb: docker start rothschild-test-mysql || (docker run --name rothschild-test-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=testpass -p 3306:3306 --health-cmd='mysqladmin ping --silent' -d mysql:5.6 mysqld --innodb-strict-mode=ON --sql_mode=IGNORE_SPACE,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES --server_id=1 --log-bin=bin.log --log-bin-index=bin-log.index --binlog_format=row && until [ `docker inspect --format '{{.State.Health.Status}}' rothschild-test-mysql` = "healthy" ]; do echo 'waiting for MySQL to become healthy' && sleep 1; done)
